original_title: 200 smart classrooms and 2,000 Tabs for Southern Province schools
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has presented 200 smart classrooms and 2,000 Tablet computers to students in the Southern Province schools, under the Southern Province Smart Classroom Project, at the Hall de Galle this morning (06).
The President’s Media Division (PMD) said the project was carried out at a cost of Rs. 300 million.
The initiative has been launched as per the request of Minister of Health Dr. Ramesh Pathirana, according to the PMD.
